file.title: Image align

p.text: The image position (alignment) on the object (On left, On bottom, Centered, etc.).

p.textAll: All available alignments are described in: Quick fill words -> Alignments.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how button image alignment can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Image align = Center Window1.Button1.Image align = "Bottom left" Window1.Button1.Image align = Window1.Button2.Text align Window1.Button1.Image align = Window1.Text1.Text
